summary: Documentation link in WorkerOptions.workflowBundle docstring is broken and points to non-existent page. User cannot find the referenced production deployment documentation.
userImpact: Users following documentation examples are directed to broken links, preventing them from learning proper production deployment practices for TypeScript workers.
rootCause: Documentation page at https://docs.temporal.io/typescript/production-deploy#pre-build-code does not exist or has been moved.
keyQuote: The following link is in the docstrings: https://docs.temporal.io/typescript/production-deploy#pre-build-code and it does not resolve.
